scripts.install:all: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build:development: cd client && npm run build:development && cd ../server && npm run build:development
scripts.build:production: cd client && npm run build:production && cd ../server && npm run build:production
scripts.dev:development: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev:development" "cd client && npm run dev:development"
scripts.dev:production: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev:production" "cd client && npm run dev:production"
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
scripts.type-check: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run type-check
scripts.test: cd server && npm run test && cd ../client && npm run test
